item.title: Refactor HTML by ng-template
item.description: Table of content Introduction ng-template Problem Solution with ng-template Introduction ng-template The <ng-template> is an Angular element for rendering HTML. It is never displayed directly. In fact, before rendering the view, Angular replaces the <ng-template> and its contents with a comment. see here for more information. Problem In the angular component there are many pieces of code repeatedly that makes your template long. This causes us hard to maintain our code base.
